title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Motif Vanki Bangle (Armlet)
features: An exquisite statement vanki (armlet), featuring a meticulously crafted openwork design. The focal point is a vibrant square-cut natural emerald, complemented by the subtle sparkle of Polki diamonds (uncut diamonds). The floral motif is meticulously detailed. Traditional Telugu design elements are seamlessly interwoven with modern aesthetics for a truly stunning piece. The gold has a slight matte finish.
colors: Primarily Gold with accents of Vivid Green (Emerald) and Sparkling White (Diamonds)
occasions: and festive celebrations. Ideal for a bride's trousseau or as a cherished heirloom.
description: This Vanki bangle blends the elegance of traditional South Indian design with the contemporary appeal of Polki diamonds. The emerald, a symbol of prosperity and new beginnings, adds a touch of regal charm. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, guaranteeing both beauty and durability.
